about_the_game:
The movable survival game where you control goblins and travel across the islands and through the seas trying to survive. You will have to fish and hunt, survive and build, manage your settlement and destroy everything that gets in the way! But don’t forget your main goal — find your missing master Jagoondo

Survival on the sea:
At the beginning of the game you have to survive on the sea and gather a gang of Goblins from sunken ships for future raider seizures

Survival on the land:
Rob on the islands or settle on them. But keep in mind that it’s dangerous there!

Complicated processes:
Resources are valuable tools that are not so easy to get your hands on! Construction takes time and a lot of different stuff. Feel free to rule your minions to shift your troubles onto them. But keep in mind that they are quite slow

///The game is in early development. Information will be updated
We are open to all suggestions for the game. Write to us on the website or in the Steam Community
detailed_description:
The movable survival game where you control goblins and travel across the islands and through the seas trying to survive. You will have to fish and hunt, survive and build, manage your settlement and destroy everything that gets in the way! But don’t forget your main goal — find your missing master Jagoondo

Survival on the sea:
At the beginning of the game you have to survive on the sea and gather a gang of Goblins from sunken ships for future raider seizures

Survival on the land:
Rob on the islands or settle on them. But keep in mind that it’s dangerous there!

Complicated processes:
Resources are valuable tools that are not so easy to get your hands on! Construction takes time and a lot of different stuff. Feel free to rule your minions to shift your troubles onto them. But keep in mind that they are quite slow

///The game is in early development. Information will be updated
We are open to all suggestions for the game. Write to us on the website or in the Steam Community
legal_notice: You can use our content for non-commercial projects and your game prototyping

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M2
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: M2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M2
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

name: Jagoondo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 "7gen" or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Not tasted on Windows 8.1 and below
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5 "7gen" or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Not tasted on Windows 8.1 and below

short_description: Third-person survival game, where you have to stay alive and travel the ocean. Each foray is a challenge. Sharks and other creatures constantly will want to eat you up. Collect resources, build bases, manage minions and travel to the Islands searching of missing Jagoondo!
